snippet.title: Mad Dog McCree
snippet.description:
The class laserdisc lightgun game returns! Mad Dog McCree and his band of cutthroats have riden into town, kiddnapped the Mayor and his daughter and taken them to his hideout. These hombres are mean and vicious. What this town needs is a gunslinger to spray a little lead in harm's way.

Mad Dog McCree is currently available for the PS2, Xbox, DVD-Video and PC CD-ROM.

The CD-ROM version supports the Act-Labs USB light gun or mouse.

Order Now at www.digitalleisure.com
